name: EvergreenCovenantChurch
0:
”Alexa, open evergreen covenant church”
”Alexa, ask evergreen covenant church for the latest talk”
”Alexa, start evergreen covenant church”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: evergreen covenant church
des: Listen to the latest sermons from Evergreen Covenant Church. You can pause and play by saying "Alexa, pause" and "Alexa, resume." Just say "Alexa, stop" when you're done for the day. When listening to sermons you can say "Alexa, shuffle" to shuffle the playing order, or "Alexa, loop" to loop the current episode. You can also ask for previous and next episodes by saying "Alexa, previous" and "Alexa, next". Please note - your activities with our skill are not shared with us. If you have any suggestions for how we can improve our Alexa skill, please let us know. Thank you. Evergreen Covenant Church Worship Team.
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
